name: scare her, save her
description:
scare her, save her A chill bullet hell (where you shoot the bullets too)

Help an evil spirit haunt a girl. Then, shoot heavenly beams of light to stop it from ever reaching her. Repeat until you can't keep up.

Made for Mini Jam 103: Darkness, with the limitation: you are your own enemy. In this game, your enemy is you from the past!

CONTROLS

  • Move the spirit - Arrow Keys
  • Aim the light - Up/Down
  • Shoot the light - Z

If you enjoyed the game, please give it a rating! Thank you :)
